import math

# Calculate some mathematical constants
print(f"π = {math.pi}")
print(f"e = {math.e}")
print(f"Golden ratio φ = {(1 + math.sqrt(5)) / 2}")

# List comprehension example
squares = [x**2 for x in range(1, 6)]
print(f"Squares 1-5: {squares}")

# Simple algorithm
def fibonacci(n):
    if n <= 1:
        return n
    return fibonacci(n-1) + fibonacci(n-2)

print(f"Fibonacci sequence (first 10): {[fibonacci(i) for i in range(10)]}")
